``` {.python .cell-code}
import pandas as pd

gss = pd.read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AllenDowney/ThinkBayes2/master/data/gss_bayes.csv')
banker = (gss['indus10'] == 6870)
print(f'은행원 수: { banker.sum() }')
print(f'은행원 비율: { banker.mean() }')
```

    """A의 확률 계산"""
    return A.mean()

## 조건부 확률

::: {#7e8187f2 .cell execution_count=7}
``` {.python .cell-code}
selected = democrat[liberal]
prob(selected)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=7}
```
0.5206403320240125
```
:::
:::


진보(liberal) 성향 중 민주당(democrat)의 비율

::: {#4acfbdd7 .cell execution_count=8}
``` {.python .cell-code}
def conditional(proposition, given):
  return prob(proposition[given])
conditional(liberal, given=female)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=8}
```
0.27581004111500884
```
:::
:::


::: {#974376da .cell execution_count=9}
``` {.python .cell-code}
prob(liberal & female) / prob(female)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=9}
```
0.2758100411150089
```
:::
:::


$P(A|B) = \frac{P(A and B)}{P(B)}$

::: {#8086091d .cell execution_count=10}
``` {.python .cell-code}
print(prob(female) * conditional(liberal, given=female))
print(prob(female & liberal))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
0.14834652059241224
0.14834652059241227
```
:::
:::


$P(A and B) = P(B)P(A|B)$

::: {#42b923c2 .cell execution_count=11}
``` {.python .cell-code}
conditional(female, given=liberal)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=11}

0.5419106203216483

조건부 확률은 교환 불가

::: {#8728b21a .cell execution_count=12}
``` {.python .cell-code}
print(conditional(female, given=liberal))
print(prob(female) * conditional(liberal, given=female) / prob(liberal))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
0.5419106203216483
0.5419106203216482
```
:::
:::


$P(A|B) = \frac{P(A)*P(B|A)}{P(B)}$

::: {#d61aed09 .cell execution_count=13}
``` {.python .cell-code}
male = (gss['sex'] == 1)
sum(prob(gss['sex'] == i) * conditional(banker, gss['sex'] == i) for i in range(1, 3))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=13}
```
0.014769730168391153
```
:::
:::


$P(A) = P(B_1)P(A|B_1) + P(B_2)P(A|B_2)$
